repetitions.sourceText: Visit 7, 8, 9 etc (Day 360±14; and every 4th month ±14 days)

traversalConstraints.sourceText: [{'condition': 'If subject discontinues investigational product early', 'path': ['PREMATURE_TREATMENT_DISCONTINUATION_VISIT', 'MODIFIED_FOLLOW_UP']}, {'condition': 'If volume status requires adjustment', 'path': ['IP_DOSE_REDUCTION', 'IP_INTERRUPTION', 'IP_RESTART']}]

executionTypes.rationale: Obtained once at the start of the study as part of screening/enrollment.
Total symptom score is assessed at multiple visits (e.g., Visit 2 and Visit 6) to evaluate changes over time.
Continuous monitoring and recording of events from the time of consent through the study closure visit.
Conditional workflow based on the evaluation of volume status or acute worsening of heart failure.
Scheduled procedures added to specific visits (Visit 2 and Visit 6) for sub-study participants.
Continuous recording of cardiovascular medications in the eCRF throughout the course of the study.
Protocol-mandated laboratory values are systematically analyzed at scheduled intervals.

footnoteConditions.text: g. SAEs will be collected from the time of informed consent throughout the study until and including the patient’s last visit. endpointAlgorithms.name: Primary: CV death or HF event
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Hazard Ratio < 1.0 (Superiority of dapagliflozin vs placebo)
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: Time to the first occurrence of any of the components of this composite: 1. CV death 2. Hospitalisation for HF 3. An urgent HF visit

endpointAlgorithms.name: Secondary: CV death or hospitalisation for HF
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Statistically significant reduction in hazard ratio
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: Time to the first occurrence of any of the components of this composite: 1. CV death 2. Hospitalisation for HF

endpointAlgorithms.name: Secondary: Recurrent HF hospitalisations and CV death
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Reduction in total number of events compared to placebo
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: Total number of recurrent HF hospitalisations and CV death.

endpointAlgorithms.name: Secondary: KCCQ Total Symptom Score
endpointAlgorithms.successCriteria: Improvement in total symptom score vs placebo
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: Change from baseline measured at 8 months in the total symptom score of the KCCQ

endpointAlgorithms.name: Secondary: Worsening Renal Function Composite
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: Time to the first occurrence of any of the components of this composite: 1. ≥50% sustained* decline in estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) 2. Reaching End Stage Renal Disease... 3. Renal death

endpointAlgorithms.name: Secondary: All-cause mortality
endpointAlgorithms.sourceText: Time to death from any cause.

derivedVariables.name: Time to first occurrence of CV death or HF event
derivedVariables.analysisWindow: From randomization to end of study
derivedVariables.imputationRule: Censoring at last known date alive and event-free

derivedVariables.name: Time to first occurrence of CV death or hospitalisation for HF
derivedVariables.analysisWindow: From randomization to end of study
derivedVariables.imputationRule: Censoring at last known date alive and event-free

derivedVariables.name: Total number of recurrent HF hospitalisations and CV death
derivedVariables.derivationRule: Sum of all adjudicated HF hospitalisation events plus CV death event

derivedVariables.name: Change from baseline in KCCQ total symptom score
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: Last non-missing value prior to randomization

derivedVariables.name: Change in body weight from baseline
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: Last non-missing value prior to randomization

derivedVariables.name: Time to first fatal or non-fatal MI
derivedVariables.analysisWindow: From randomization to end of study

derivedVariables.name: Time to first fatal or non-fatal stroke
derivedVariables.analysisWindow: From randomization to end of study

derivedVariables.name: eGFR decline >= 50% from baseline
derivedVariables.baselineDefinition: Last non-missing central lab value prior to randomization

transitions.trigger: Progress to Premature treatment discontinuation visit (PTDV)
